item.description:
Although we will be studying a book this group will be more that just a book club. We will be beginning a Master Mind Group. Here we use the principles that Napoleon Hill discovered from 500 of the most successful people in this country who mainly recognized that two minds are ultimately greater than one.
There will be a time for goal setting each week. Members will have a time to share their successes and also ask for the benefit of brainstorming for support.

Looking forward to seeing you next week, Wednesday, February 17th, 12-1:30, where we'll be talking about
Persistence!!!

See you all then,

~ Lauren

group.name: Think and Grow Rich MasterMind Study Group

item.name: Think and Grow Abundant MasterMind Study Group
